definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: This inhibiting effect was due chiefly to the concentration of combined nitrogen.
sentences.chinese: 化合态氮的抑制作用与浓度密切相关。

sentences.english: The content of different form nitrogen in vegetable field is higher than wood soil.
sentences.chinese: 土壤中各种形态氮的含量菜地上壤高于林地土壤。

sentences.english: This radioactive form of nitrogen does not occur in nature.
sentences.chinese: 氮的这种放射性形式在自然界中不会产生。

sentences.english: Algae feed on the nitrogen-rich waste products generated by the embryos.
sentences.chinese: 藻类以胚胎产生的富含氮的废弃物受益。

sentences.english: In all tests video card and processor were cooled by liquid nitrogen.
sentences.chinese: 在所有测试的显示卡和处理器被冷却的液态氮。

sentences.english: Experimental study on the nitrogen of total nitrogen content of soybean.
sentences.chinese: 实验研究了施氮对大豆全氮含量的影响。

sentences.english: A process that is used to liquefy nitrogen.
At the same time, it is described how to treat the denitrified residua.
sentences.chinese: 同时还简要介绍了脱氮残渣的处理方法。

sentences.english: In this way they can ensure adequate N is inexpensively available through BNF.
sentences.chinese: 这样他们保证可以从生物固氮充分得到便宜的氮。

sentences.english: The coupling and alternating effects between water and N on the biomass exist obviously.
sentences.chinese: 氮和水的耦合作用对洋白蜡生物量影响明显。

sentences.english: Nitrides have intricate impacts on the performance of the petroleum.
sentences.chinese: 氮对石油产品性能的影响是复杂的。

sentences.english: EDX and XPS measurements show that they are nitrogen doped carbon nanotubes.
sentences.chinese: EDX和结果都表明氮掺杂到碳纳米管中。

sentences.english: Nitrate nitrogen removal from ground water by autotrophic denitrification in a packed bed reactor.
sentences.chinese: 固定床自养反硝化去除地下水中的硝酸盐氮。

sentences.english: Then anaerobic bacteria take that nitrate and turn it into harmless nitrogen gas.
sentences.chinese: 最后厌氧菌将硝酸盐转化成无害的气体氮。

sentences.english: Research methods about standard samples of water quality determination of Kjeldahl nitrogen were put forward.
sentences.chinese: 提出了水质凯氏氮标准样品的研究方法。

sentences.english: And the effects of S-3307 on nitrogen metabolism was higher than carbohydrate metabolism.
sentences.chinese: 烯效唑对氮代谢的促进作用大于对糖代谢。
